title: Janet Daby – 2021 Comments on Trump Supporters Attacking the Capitol Building
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Janet Daby, the Labour MP for Lewisham East, on 6 January 2021.
content:
The scenes in the US is one of violence [sic] rioters. It’s not protestors but instead is an attack on democracy.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

I hope everyone in US Capitol is safe.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
